channel.title: Help - weapon stats!
channel.description: can someone help me.. i wana change stats on a piece of equipment (santa hat) cause some admins want a over powered item to 1 hit and to play around with.. can someone tell me how to make santa hat to 1 hit everything in game?

item.title: Help - weapon stats!
item.dc:creator: @uberpker12 uberpker12
item.description:
@uberpker12 wrote:

ok thanks so only last 5-6?

Read full topic

item.title: Help - weapon stats!
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

go into item.java and find the item you wanna change. etc you wanna change Santa, so search 1050 (ctrl + f) then it should look like. “santa 1050 - 0 0 00 0000 00000” etc. that was an example. find the last 5-6 dig get 0’s and change them.

Read full topic
